mireka.transmission.queue

Class QueueStorageException

  • Object
    • Throwable
      • Exception
        • mireka.transmission.LocalMailSystemException
          • mireka.transmission.queue.QueueStorageException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class QueueStorageException
extends LocalMailSystemException
    Signals that a mail cannot be stored, moved or accepted because of a local error.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
